item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.content:encoded:
@maya –

No need for fake snow here, even though it has been melting away, forecast calls for more this weekend.

We’ve got this stuff called IceMelt, which does a pretty good job of keeping the ice away.

item.title: By: maya
item.dc:creator: maya
item.description: Oh yeah, don't forget to salt the sidewalk and driveway so you won't fall!
item.content:encoded: Oh yeah, don’t forget to salt the sidewalk and driveway so you won’t fall!

item.title: By: maya
item.dc:creator: maya
item.description: OMG, great pictures. It's nothing like that here in Northern Cali - doesn't feel much like the Christmas season. I'm from the East Coast so remember growing up playing in the snow. They had a holiday festival downtown this past weekend where they brought in fake snow so the kids could play in it. Hilarious!
item.content:encoded: OMG, great pictures. It’s nothing like that here in Northern Cali – doesn’t feel much like the Christmas season. I’m from the East Coast so remember growing up playing in the snow. They had a holiday festival downtown this past weekend where they brought in fake snow so the kids could play in it. Hilarious!

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Scott -
An ATV, now that's what I call motivation!
item.content:encoded:
@Scott –

An ATV, now that’s what I call motivation!

item.title: By: Scott Barlow
item.dc:creator: Scott Barlow
item.description: Go crazy and get an ATV with a blade for pushing the snow out of the way. Less work than a blower, and with the same quality. Just a little more pricey, but it *guarantees* that you'll want to get out and shovel that snow ;)
item.content:encoded: Go crazy and get an ATV with a blade for pushing the snow out of the way. Less work than a blower, and with the same quality. Just a little more pricey, but it *guarantees* that you’ll want to get out and shovel that snow ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Very picturesque, but I highly recommend the snow blower. (First thing that came to my mind when I saw your footprints in the driveway was, "I bet he posted this *before* he got to shovel off all that snow!")
item.content:encoded: Very picturesque, but I highly recommend the snow blower. (First thing that came to my mind when I saw your footprints in the driveway was, “I bet he posted this *before* he got to shovel off all that snow!”)

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.content:encoded:
@Deane –

I don’t have a snow blower yet (going to have to get one though), but a neighbor was kind enough to do my driveway and walkway while doing his.

@Acrobatic –

Yeah, yeah, rub it in ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Acrobatic
item.dc:creator: Acrobatic
item.description: It was 71 here in Dallas today ... I'm dreaming of a green Christmas.
item.content:encoded: It was 71 here in Dallas today … I’m dreaming of a green Christmas.

item.title: By: Deane
item.dc:creator: Deane
item.description: We have the exact same thing over here in South Dakota. I just got in from blowing snow.
item.content:encoded: We have the exact same thing over here in South Dakota. I just got in from blowing snow.
